DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare two oral treatment : Ofloxacin + Metronidazole , Azitromycin +Metronidazole outpatient Pelvic Inflammatory Disease . Materials Methods : Two hundred patient divide two group ( A , B ) . Group A ( treat Ofloxacin 400 mg. + Metronidazole 500mg ) Group B ( single dose oral Azitromicine 1gr + Metronidazole 500mg ) 10 day , compare term side effect efficacy
